info.sockets.jei.chargeful_gem: Adds a chance for lightnings when socketed into a tool/weapon, and attacking.
info.sockets.jei.diamond_gem: Adds damage when socketed into a tool/weapon. Resists some damage in armor.
info.sockets.jei.emerald_gem: Adds extra xp to block drops when socketed into a tool/weapon.
info.sockets.jei.enchantful_gem: Adds the enchantments this gem has. Can't work with Anvils. May be found in dungeons.
info.sockets.jei.lazuli_gem: Adds fortune when socketed into a tool/weapon.
info.sockets.jei.ruby_gem: Adds auto smelting when socketed into a tool.
info.sockets.jei.sapphire_gem: Adds looting when socketed into a tool/weapon.
tooltip.sockets.enchantful_gem: Enchant this Gem and it's socket shall be as well.
